titles.title: Providing for consideration of a concurrent resolution waiving the requirement in section 132 of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 that the Congress adjourn sine die not later than July 31, 1999.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-274, by Mr. Dreier.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 97.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 266.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/29/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of a concurrent resolution waiving the requirement of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 that the Congress adjourn sine die not later than July 31, 1999.
